triples.name: Information extraction
triples.relevance: Event extraction is a subproblem of information extraction that the paper builds upon.

triples.name: Question answering
triples.relevance: The paper proposes a novel QA-based paradigm for solving event extraction in an end-to-end manner.

triples.name: Named-entity recognition
triples.relevance: The paper addresses error propagation from entity recognition as a preprocessing step in traditional event extraction.

triples.name: Zero-shot learning
triples.relevance: The paper demonstrates the framework's ability to extract event arguments for unseen roles in a zero-shot learning setting.

triples.name: Natural language processing
triples.relevance: Event extraction and question answering are core NLP tasks that form the basis of this research.
